JobFullDesc: This is an exciting time at Instagram, and understanding people is central to our mission.We're seeking a leader for the Instagram Marketing Insights team who demonstrates remarkable ability to harness and translate strategic insights into actionable marketing plans and communications and create strong cross-functional partnerships with marketing, product, policy and communications. This role will help enable the success of the brand marketing function, help launch compelling new products, optimize marketing performance, refine audience approaches and ultimately create more value for users around the world.The ideal candidate will be a marketing research expert, with exceptional research skills across both qualitative and quantitative methodologies, proven hands-on experience as practitioner and leader, a hunger to drive significant business impact/outcomes, an orientation toward strategic thinking to drive product/brand outcomes, and an interest to remain deeply engaged in the execution of work. Strong time management and communication skills are critical, and a passion for technology and Instagram is a must. Candidates must be comfortable and effective working with remote teams around the world, and with a wide range of internal partners: marketing, product, communications, public policy, and user experience.Lead research to shape Instagram’s brand strategy and help build reputation and trust for the brand as it continues to grow.Partner with marketing, communications and product organizations to understand consumer needs and product use cases, define brand positioning, develop audiences, inform creative expression, execute go-to-market plans, and optimize/improve marketing communications to achieve business objectives.Design and execute comprehensive, best-in-class quant and qual research programs, at both the product and brand level. Leadership in technique and methodology is essential.Translate data insights into actions and recommendations.Build influence among leadership through highly effective communication, partnership and provocation, ability to engage and influence decision-making.Partner with Decision Science to develop hypotheses and comprehensive test and measurement plans, to design and execute experiments to achieve marketing objectives and drive marketing effectiveness.Lead and develop a prospering team of 15+ researchers, steward growth plans for the organization and current ICs/managers based on business priorities and employee goals.Travel domestic and international up to 20% of the time, once travel resumes post-COVID.MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS12+ years of experience leading marketing or product research teams, expert knowledge in qualitative and quantitative methods.Proven expertise in leading insights-driven marketing campaigns/product launches from definition to execution, driving impact and influencing decision-making.Experience in brand building and brand strategy development, interface with creatives and brand marketers to steward successful campaigns from start to finish,
